pages.text:
[Page Title: Private Events – The Peacock Restaurant and Bar]

Private Events

Host an unforgettable private event at The Peacock
Check for availability 
A one-of-a-kind venue in Downtown Charleston

The Peacock Charleston is an Art Deco-inspired restaurant, bar, and event venue spanning two floors and a rooftop. With four beautiful event spaces under one roof and a classically trained in-house catering team, we are fully equipped for any event large or small.
Inquire Now 1st FLOOR 
Main Dining Room

Overlooking East Bay Street and featuring a stunning large full bar and 20-foot ceilings, our charming art deco restaurant is perfect for large private dining events with seating for 65 guests.
2nd Floor 
Peacock Alley

The Alley is designed to impress with lush art deco decor, a private full-sized bar, floor-to-ceiling views, private bathrooms, elevator access, ambience lighting, and a secret library lounge. Great for private dining (seating up to 30), cocktail parties, rehearsal dinner & so much more.

Peacock Alley + V's Speakeasy can be rented together for a private floor of event space
2ND Floor 
V's Speakeasy

This flexible space is perfect for all event types, from corporate presentations and private dinners to late night after parties. This space features velvet lounge furniture, a stage, AV setup, a dance floor, three 13-foot projection screens, a top-of-the-line lighting system & endless configuration options.
3rd floor 
Rooftop

A rooftop oasis overlooking the Customs House and Charleston Harbor with three lounge cabanas, a beautiful full sized bar and multiple outdoor T.Vs.
Private Events 
a Premier Charleston Event venue

With countless events under our belt, our team is ready to help execute your event to make it special and truly unique.

Private Dining

Rehearsal Dinners, Welcome or After Parties

Weddings, Proposal & Elopements

Corporate Events

Business Dinners with Presentations

Full Venue Buyouts

Birthdays & Anniversaries

& so much more!
Check for availability
